pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![random_topic](https://i.imgur.com/1248yt1.png)# random_topicFetch random topics to start conversations.For Async version visit [here](https://github.com/johan-naizu/aiotopics)![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/random_topic) ![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/random_topic) ![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/random_topic) ![PyPI - License](https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/random_topic)## Installation```pippip install random_topic```## Usage```pythonimport random_topictopic=random_topic.get_topic()print(topic)
